data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Nimroz to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nimroz, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Nimroz to agree with you and with one another.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6331 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Nimroz, Afghanistan, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Nimroz, Afghanistan to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Afghan, Tajik people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, help the fearful in Nimroz, Afghanistan to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 29 believers in Nimroz, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nimroz, Afghanistan has a population of 183,600.

We estimate Nimroz has 29 people who might know Jesus, 6 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 183,565 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,331 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Nimroz, Afghanistan to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

location.name: Nimroz
location.cities_list: Zaranj, Khāsh, Mīrābād, Rūdbār, Dūst Moḩammad Khān
